title: Cloak of Blades
description: There is no honor among thieves.My name is Nadia, and I’m a shadow agent of the High Queen of the Elves.That means I use magic to steal things for her.Now she wants me to steal a treasure from an Elven lord without him even realizing that it’s missing.To pull it off, I’ll need a crew.But there is no honor among thieves, and not even all the magic in the world can protect me from a blade in the back…
author: Jonathan Moeller
